TopicTitle: What do you name your space agencies?

Articles.Content: Using something Russian would be cool, like the O.K.B. I am naming all of my ships in Chinese, and probably my space program too
I call my program the Asgard Program. All rockets are named after some figure that appears in Norse Mythology!
Daemonic Aerospace is mine

Usually I just use my name, but I do have a save called "Hellfire Laboratories" just cause I wanted to make a science division for my cam sats, and to join in on the flags thread

Neat idea, but my idea is to do that and have a unique "trademark" on each of the ships/rockets/spaceplanes.

Started when Kevin Bacon descended onto Kerbin and gave the inhabitants the gift of spaceflight.

Close, most of my space stations were named by a viewer on my livestreams named BAconDestructor
was FLX Aeronautics before, still thinking of a new one.
Or DSA-Daze Space Agency or "daze corp."

National Kerbal Astronautics Adminstration. The NKAA.

Goverment Agency, budget has around 20% of National Budget. Not privately funded. Works with the UKDF, the United Kerbin Defense Force, providing satellites and ion cannons. Has 900 Kerbals working as the launch crew, 2,431 Kerbals in the Flght Research Department, 1,392 in the Probes Department, 500 Kerbals maintaining KSC2, should the main get destroyed, 763 in charge of the astronauts, 56 in the health-care unit, 452 Astronauts, 5,881 backup astronauts, and a team of 10 gravediggers.

Altea Aerospace, from the Orbiter Add-on

I plan on using their logo for my .20 flag
ZASD Zachistan Aerospace Division

Greenwolf Incorporated

Terminals, Apple Juice & Spacecraft
It's the MMP: Manned Missile Program. My landers are just missiles that don't explode.
It's already named the Kerbal Space Program, however, they do give all of their contracts to

Bingle-bongle-dingle-dangle-yickety-do-yickety-dah-ping-pong-lippy-tappy-too-tah-dyne Aerospace, LLC. A wholly owned subsidiary of Tactical Laser Monkeys, Inc.

Sontar-HA!

Edited May 19, 2013 by Guest

BASA (Brabbit's Aeronautics and Space Administration)

I will probably come up with something more original eventually .

I never really thought about doing that. I just called it the Kerbal Space Program.

(It's a Space Program with in a Space program. I love puns.)

But there's no "Human space program" is there? Maybe I'll have to think of something.

Totally original.

Kerbal Aeronautics and Space Administration...

Wait, that sounds familiar...

MBSC - Moar Boostas Space Crap

*boooooOOOOOOoooom*

KDSA - KD Space Agency

We also have a flag.

Nolte whatever I'm trying to build. Go Nick Go. Update 5/26/2013. The Nolte line has been scrapped, Only 1 out of 4 worked and it was not hooked together well. I am now trying to begin a space station. Maybe something from DS9.

Edited May 27, 2013 by GhostFlight

Well... my Agency has made many Kerbals sad , so I'll name it...

Electronic Arts.

jk it's ERA (Explosion-Related Agency)
Right now it's XOO .. XartaoX Orbital Operations .. XartaoX being a common video-game name I use .. and XOO (pronounced zoo) I find humorous for a space agency.
i think the forum rules prevent me from saying those words here.

Mine's the Pathfinder Company, or Ã¦Å½Â¢Ã¨Â·Â¯Ã¥â€¦Â¬Ã¥ÂÂ¸. (I hope that's written right, somebody please correct me if it's wrong.)

Originally a fuel exploration Company, it has expanded into fuel mining and production and new technologies research, and is currently developing it's private space program in order to exploit extra-kerbinal resources.

Think early Weyland-Yutani Corporation.
